text:
Hundreds of women took out a rally in the town on Thursday creating awareness of women’s rights.

Flagged off by Sun Lions Club president T.P. Ravindran, the rally started from Kodaikanal municipal office and ended at Adhithanar Mandapam after passing through Seven Road Junction, Anna Road and KC Grounds. Women members of various voluntary organisations and clubs took part in the rally.
title: Rally taken out for women’s rights
